EnhancedContent:
[Copilot coding agent](https://docs.github.com/copilot/concepts/agents/coding-agent/about-coding-agent), our asynchronous, autonomous background agent, now works with [Copilot code referencing](https://docs.github.com/copilot/concepts/completions/code-referencing).

If the agent generates code that matches code in a public GitHub repository, the matching code will be highlighted in the agent session logs with a link to the original code, so you can understand where the code comes from and any license that may apply.

Copilot coding agent does not support the “Suggestions matching public code” policy’s `Block` mode. When the policy is set to `Block` , suggestions matching public code will not be blocked, and instead will be highlighted in the session logs.

For more information, see [“Finding public code that matches GitHub Copilot suggestions” in the GitHub Docs](https://docs.github.com/copilot/how-tos/get-code-suggestions/find-matching-code?tool=webui#view-code-references-for-copilot-coding-agent).
Title: Copilot coding agent supports code referencing
Author: Allison
Description:
